pr_title: [dart-dio] fixes Enum classes with integer values

timeline.message: [dart-dio] Enum classes with int values now generate correct BuiltValueEnumConst annotation

timeline.author: kuhnroyal

timeline.bodyText: FYI just noticed 2 times $number1 here. My changes also don't fix this yet. Need to address this seperatly.
timeline.author: kuhnroyal

timeline.bodyText: Use {{^isInteger}} to prevent the double enum from failing.
timeline.author: kuhnroyal

timeline.bodyText: See above comment in template. Sadly wireNumber:  doesn't support num/double. Probably need to add a custom serializer for this at some point.
timeline.author: kuhnroyal
